reviews.title: Hotel to airport transfer
reviews.review_text: We used this service to pick us up from our hotel in Sultanahmet and drop us off at the airport. The driver was there 15 minutes before pick up time and the car was absolutely clean and beautiful. I would recommend this setvice highly.

Istanbul Cable Car.description: The Istanbul Cable Car is a mode of everyday commuter transport that takes you to a hilltop overlooking splendid views of the Golden Horn and the Bosporus River. You can purchase tokens with coins or small notes for either a one- or two-way ride, or use your Istanbulkart to get a discount on the fare. Lines for the cable car are known to be rather long—visit in the early morning for fewer crowds. The cable car is also one of the stops of the hop-on-hop-off bus, and can be combined with a jaunt around Eyup’s main shopping district. – Tripadvisor

reviews.title: GREAT VIEW
reviews.review_text: A short journey on the cable car around 3 - 4 minutes but worth it for the view across the Bosphorus from the lovely terrace which has a cafe.

reviews.title: Long queue … but worth the wait !
reviews.review_text: We went here on a tour . Queue was very long ( out of the building and up the steps ! ) it was just over half an hour queuing to get on to the cable car .Each car takes 8 people and the carts are in twos so 16 people at a time go up.( same down ) the views from the top,were worth the wait - panoramic views across the Golden horn and the city.  Very peaceful and relaxing at viewpoint. Interesting to see the cemetery from the cable car too .

reviews.title: Great country
reviews.review_text: This trip was even better than expected.  The sites, food and most importantly the Turkish people made this a great trip.  We can’t wait to go back and spend more time in this wonderful country.

reviews.title: Something to do... But acceptable to skip this one too
reviews.review_text:
Just something to do to pass the time in Istanbul. Don't think this is intended as a tourist attraction - the ride is approximately 2-3 mins. However, not a bad little thing to do if you want to couple it with Ayub Sultan mosque.

The cable cars pass over graves; think the entire hillside is a graveyard. 

There is a cafe at the top (Pierre Lottie?) and you can rest up after the grueling ride up. I don't think there is anything else to comment on tbh.

Your Istanbul card will work here and there are top up machines at both the base and top. You can also select a wide variety of languages at the machine so you know what you're doing when using it.

reviews.title: Very long waiting time for very little pay off
reviews.review_text: Around a 40 minute wait to get on, for a two minute journey to go to Pierre Loti hill. Went disrespectfully close over graves, if I was aware of this, I wouldn't have used the cable cars.

Istanbul.description: Over the centuries, many cultures have added their mark to this prized piece of land. Today, you can experience those influences firsthand by exploring Istanbul’s mahalles (neighborhoods). From the holy sites of Sultanahmet and the 19th-century European elegance of Beyoğlu to the high fashion of Nişantaşı, the vibrant café society of Kadıköy and the football-loving streets of Beşiktaş, it’s easy to see why travelers say that Istanbul isn’t just one city, but many cities within one.

reviews.title: Our new favorite hotel!
reviews.review_text: We were so impressed by the entire staff of the hotel. It was our young daughters’ birthdays and they helped celebrate by ensuring we had connecting rooms, decorating our daughters’ room with pink balloons and treats, and even at breakfast gave them more treats! We really appreciated how kind they were to our two children. The location is excellent, we walked to most places and took evening strolls across the bridge with our children. We will be back!

reviews.title: Delicious food, great ambience
reviews.review_text: Strada is a well known restaurant located in one of Istanbul's most expensive areas. Its strongest point is its delicious starters, with the dynamite shrimp and Mardin Bulgur Tabboulee being a standout. I ordered myself a Smoked Ribeye & Buratta pizza, which, despite sounding excessive, was incredibly delicious. I'm not exaggerating when I say it was the best pizza I've had in Istanbul. My girlfriend ordered asparagus risotto, and we also tried the seafood linguine, which was tasty but not my personal preference as I'm not a big fan of seafood pasta. It's important to note that if you're planning a birthday celebration, Strada doesn't allow you to bring your own birthday cake for some reason. Overall, everything was delicious, and I would say it was well worth the price.

reviews.title: Good choice.
reviews.review_text: Hotel is conveniently located for exploring Istanbul. Easy access to all major tourist attractions. In the vicinity of Galata tower in a very vibrant area with lots of restaurants , bars shops. Few minutes walk to Istiklal . Short walking distance to Galata bridge, piers of Hasimpasha or Karakoy thus for ferry transport which we would recommend as favorable mean of transport for exploring wider Istanbul. Great hospitality approach starting from reception and particularly from owner Zejnep who really paid attention on our needs during our stay. Rooftop restaurant where good breakfast is served is additional plus to overall impression. Rooms spacious clean and comfortable.

reviews.title: Rent a wheelchair
reviews.review_text: I searched so much to find a wheelchair for my mom. Honestly the price was cheaper than others and such a nice person who could speak English fluently. super on time service, super helpful, the wheelchair was so new and comfortable. I recommend this service extremely

reviews.title: Must try
reviews.review_text: Very very Very beautiful and quiet. Great service! The food was amazing and the price it’s not bad. Love it the lentil soup is great

Romance Istanbul Hotel.description: Romance Istanbul Hotel has 39 rooms.Every room is elegantly furnished and harmonizes the modern life style with the traditional Ottoman touch. Romance Istanbul sits at the intersection of the old city’s most important part. With its luxuriously inspiring design and landmark old city location, steeped in the history of its surroundings, Romance Istanbul Hotel welcomes you with exceptional designed rooms and world-renowned Turkish hospitality. Our colleagues deliver the most personal service. It is perfectly placed and perfectly designed to enhance all that Istanbul has to offer. Each room offers a private bathroom and shower. Each is equipped with a satellite TV and free wifi connection. The rooms size change between 20 m2 and 45 m2. It includes 7 suite rooms: 1 Royal Suite, 4 Grand Suite, 1 Romance Suite and 1 Premium Suite, 2 Luxury Room With Terrace, 22 Deluxe Room, 8 City Room.

reviews.title: Wonderful Accommodation in Ottoman History
reviews.review_text: Among the hotels I have stayed at, this was one of the best in terms of room comfort. The bed and linens were chosen with great quality. The hotel's location and room design were very fitting for the historic peninsula. The food was amazing; it was an excellent choice to taste delicious Turkish cuisine. When combined with the friendly and helpful behavior of the staff, it turned into a wonderful stay.

reviews.title: 5 star experience
reviews.review_text: Perfect service, great breakfast. Romance everywhere around us. Staff was friendly and welcomed us. Rooms at the street side are noisy when windows are open. Spa was very nice and clean. Romance hotel is my favourite hotel in Istanbul region

reviews.title: Perfect Stay at Romance Hotel
reviews.review_text: Such a Friendly staff, they were very accommodating. The breakfast was delicious with so much to choose from. The hotel is beautiful and clean. The location was perfect with the tram so close. I would recommend using a private guide on your first day to get the history of Istanbul.

reviews.title: Wonderful stay and location.
reviews.review_text: Great service. Wonderful location to walk to all of the local sites and the ferries. Spacious, beautiful, clean rooms and a wide selection for breakfast. Recommend for your stay to be near everything. They will arrange taxi service to and from the airport.

reviews.title: Great hotel -great location -great Staff
reviews.review_text: Really Nice hotel, centrally located in old Istanbul -convenient to walk to all major attractions. The Staff were very friendly and service-minded. Room was clean and beatiful and the breakfast wos really good. Highly recommend the hotel for a Get away :-)

Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus.description: Boasting a perfect location between 2 continents, indulge in a stay at Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus and discover yourself at one of the world's most alluring destinations. At the very centre of the city, yet far away from the hustle and bustle, Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus's rooms and suites allow for the highest standard of relaxation, complete with personalised comfort and services. Savor Mediterranean cuisine at Manzara, take in the view of the Bosphorus while lounging at the Summit Bar. Relax with Spa treatments, enjoy a revitalizing workout in the brand-new health club and clay tennis courts. The newly opened Monteverdi Ristorante, nestled in the heart of the city, offers an exquisite Italian fine-dining experience, featuring authentic flavors and a curated selection of Italian wines.

reviews.title: The best luxury hotel in Istanbul
reviews.review_text:
Amazing hotel, honestly cant say how good is the service, they make you feel very welcome and taken care of by everyone.
Special thanks to the sales team, reception and Cemre - Hamdi who genuinely took care of its guests.
Rooms with excellent view , restaurants are great and gym is one of the best in town

reviews.title: Excellent Service and Prime Location with Stunning Views.
reviews.review_text: Amazing location, warm and helpful team, a place where you can have a fantastic stay. The hotel staff is friendly, attentive, and strives to make your day better. The amenities in the room was surprising. The executive lounge terrace is cozy with a nice view. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Top Service, Highly Recommend
reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel and centrale location. I stayed here with my family and I must say the staff is very polite and professional. The breakfast at Manzara Resturant is one of a kind. Our server TEKIN was so attentive I thought I was dining at a Michelin Star 🌟 restaurant. Chef Cumali is a master at his craft and Cemrie and Hamdi, big thank you to you.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: Cemre and tikdag are amazing the hotel is so good hotels spa was relaxing and all the other staff was very helpful the breakfast selection was wide and delicious I will definitely come back here to stay loved the staff especially cemre and tikdag thank you so much really

reviews.title: One of the best stays in Istanbul
reviews.review_text: We are so happy with our stay in Conrad Bosphorus, all staff are great, the service is perfect. Mr. Serkan Calis one of the bell men there was so nice. The restaurant Monteverdi was good with delicious steak. The cleaning is good and the room service too.

Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus.description: The iconic Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus, with its landmark location, newly renovated guest rooms and outdoor pool, stunning views, and lush gardens, is an oasis of serenity in one of the world’s most vibrant cities. As the ambassador of Turkish hospitality, this legendary hotel serves its great heritage and service quality since 1955. Located in the heart of Istanbul next to the Congress Valley, walking distance to famous Taksim Square and responds every travelling purpose. Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus offers 475 newly renovated guest rooms, all with a balcony and with breathtaking Bosphorus or beautiful garden view. Hotel has various restaurants which offer different sceneries and exclusive dining opportunities. Interior upgrades are in progress between 10am-5pm. Garden view rooms are not affected. The outdoor pool is open during the summer with its entirely refreshed looks, the fitness center and massage services are relocated, and wet areas, including the indoor pool are closed.

reviews.title: Best person hasan <3
reviews.review_text:
Hilton hotel is one of the best 5 stars in the world. 
Mr. Hassan helps us too much. All things were good during my spend in hilton hotel. New rooms  are great . View sooooo fantastic . Very good service. When I come turkey I stay always here . Best hilton .

reviews.title: Excellent service and very kind people
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel and friendly people. Good service. The Hotel is being renovated and the work is done in a very carefull way with limited noise. Rooms are beautiful and breakfast delicious. Thanks to Ferhat and Muhammed for helping us with luggage and taxi.

reviews.title: Amazing Thanksgiving
reviews.review_text: We went for the thanksgiving dinner. Amazing food and service. I was surprised that we could find traditional turkey, mashed potatoes and apple pie for the thanksgiving in Turkey. The staff was so helpful as well. Special thanks to Doğuş and Mustafa for their interest.

reviews.title: Best Experience Ever! INCREDIBLE SERVICE! 10/10 * * * * *
reviews.review_text:
Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus is renowned for being the first Hilton built outside America, established in 1955. Although the hotel is currently undergoing a remodeling phase, this has not affected the exceptional service provided. The service was impeccable! We stayed in one of the renovated Executive Bosphorus Suites, which included a kitchenette. The room was well-designed and offered a beautiful view of the Bosphorus. Its outstanding location allowed us to easily walk to shops, the metro, and restaurants. We are very grateful to have had the opportunity to stay where history was made.

We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude to the hotel staff for making our stay unforgettable. Everyone contributed to making it exceptionally pleasant. A special thanks to Mr. Murat for his warm welcome and for offering us a two-night upgrade. We also appreciate his assistance in extending our stay to more than a week. His professionalism and kindness were much appreciated.

We traveled to Istanbul for medical treatment, and this was our second hotel near the clinic we chose to stay at. There were times when we felt down after returning to our room, but the hotel staff made us feel at home and assisted us with our needs. Mr. Ergun, who works in the lounge area, kindly offered us soup and soft foods on the nights when we couldn’t manage solid food for dinner. Mr. Berkay was very kind and supportive, providing us with a variety of refreshments whenever we stopped by for drinks. We are also very grateful to Ms. Tsira from the front office for her assistance and for consistently checking to see if we needed anything.

Our day began with a warm greeting from the wonderful housekeeper, Ms. Fatma, as we headed to breakfast. She cheerfully said, “Good morning,” but I mistakenly thought I heard, “Good night.” When I tried to correct her, she kindly taught me that in Turkish, you say “Günaydın.” This was a valuable lesson from Fatma, who became close to each of us during our stay.  Fatma was more than just a housekeeping staff member; she acted like a caregiver. She often asked my mom how she was feeling and made sure our room was clean and well-stocked. Over our ten-day stay, my mom formed a deep connection with her, making it truly sad to say goodbye to Fatma and the entire hotel staff.

Also, We would especially like to commend Mr. Erenchan, Hasan, Yasin, and Harvin at the front door for their excellent service with our luggage and transportation needs. They greeted us warmly every time we entered or exited the hotel. The front desk staff, particularly Mr. Cem, was always pleasant, welcoming us with a smile and professionalism. He was consistently ready to assist us with our needs.
Ms. Merven Nur was also frequently available in the lobby, helping guests and providing us with umbrellas when it rained. She often checked to see if there was anything else she could do to assist us. Ms. Merven Nur sent us a heartfelt thank-you card and gifts to our room. On our final evening, Mr. Yusuf arrived at our door with a smile, carrying a bottle of Wine and some Chocolates and Baklava. He set up our table and wished us well. We couldn't have asked for better service; it was customer care at its finest. This touching moment, particularly the kindness and thoughtfulness displayed by Ms. Merven Nur, left a lasting impression on our family. It truly marked a highlight of our stay.

The attention and customer service at the Hilton Bosphorus were exceptional, deserving a rating of 10 out of 10. Every staff member demonstrated that this hotel is special, historic, and well-managed. It is a place that guests will never forget, where they feel like family, and the atmosphere is just like home. The employees of this historic hotel take pride in serving others and are true ambassadors of Istanbul. They certainly made their city proud.

We are incredibly grateful for the unforgettable experience and want to express our appreciation to everyone who made our stay exceptionally pleasant. Kudos to the Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus management team!

Many thanks to everyone!

reviews.title: Amazing hotel
reviews.review_text: The pillow is amazing ! The waiter in the breakfast was the best ! Mehmet Emin was very friendly and  Helpful!!! ……………….!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!:!.!.!.!.!:!.!.!:!:!.!:!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!.!:!:!.!.!.!:!

Guided Istanbul Tours.description: 'Guided Istanbul Tours' is a privately-owned business run by the professional tour guides which caters to the independent travellers who want to see Istanbul on a one-to-one basis. Top quality private day tours and shore excursions are available to all the main sites in Istanbul with personal pick-up and drop-off included

Istanbul Duty Free.address: Terminal Caddesi No:1 Floor F, Istanbul International Airport, Istanbul 34283 Turkiye
Istanbul Duty Free.description: Located within Istanbul’s Ataturk Airport, this shopping wonderland welcomes departing travelers to peruse its range of top-tier luxury brands and ornamental wares unique to Turkey. Explore the nine different sections, with themes including Fashion Garden, Style Beach, and Family Palace. Whether you’re purchasing a designer handbag, a new watch, or the latest smartphone, inquire regarding the currency your credit card will be charged in and familiarise yourself with the process for getting your tax refund. Istanbul Duty Free offers a convenient opportunity to secure a last-minute souvenir or gift before you board your flight—coffee, chocolate, and Turkish Delight are all very popular. – Tripadvisor
Istanbul Duty Free.address_string: Terminal Caddesi No:1 Floor F, Istanbul International Airport, Istanbul 34283 Turkiye

reviews.title: Do not buy anything at Istanbul airport!!!
reviews.review_text:
If you're traveling through Istanbul Airport, be prepared to feel like you're being robbed blind. Everything is ridiculously overpriced, turning what should be a simple layover into a financial nightmare.

I went to get a quick snack at a coffee shop: a bottle of water, a croissant, and a chocolate bar that looked appealing. When I checked my charge, I was shocked to see over 60 euros on my bill! I thought this must be a mistake and approached the cashier, only to learn that the chocolate bar alone was priced at a staggering 54 euros. Yes, you read that right—a chocolate bar more expensive than a meal at a fancy restaurant.

When I insisted on returning the chocolate bar and getting reimbursed, the cashier suddenly developed "technical problems" with his cash register. After some back-and-forth, and seeing that I wasn’t going to back down, he begrudgingly handed me 50 euros, likely hoping I would just leave.

This isn't just expensive; it's outright exploitation. Even the famous Turkish delights (lokum) are overpriced to the point of absurdity—a small 250-gram box for almost 20 euros! It's a blatant rip-off aimed at travelers who don’t know the local prices or don’t have the option to leave the airport.

Do not buy anything at Istanbul Airport. Pack your own snacks or wait until you leave the terminal to shop elsewhere. It's outrageous and shameful for such a modern airport to treat travelers this way. Avoid spending a single cent here if you can.

reviews.title: excellent experience
reviews.review_text: the Istanbul  airport is very big and beautiful and it’s duty free shops are big and every items available there chocolates perfumes jewelry gifts item and many many more . Prices are little bit high and very expensive but it’s ok. Overall beautiful airport and best duty free shopping. I went to this duty free store in Istanbul week before Saturday where I got the fridge magnet of Istanbul and it cost only 5 euros which is not too bad on the way to the cruise terminal and I liked this duty free store it is very expensive and it is an excellent experience as well and hopefully I will go back to this duty free store in Istanbul in the future.

reviews.title: Antalya duty free tobacco
reviews.review_text: Duty free at Antalya airport, cigarettes. See pics. 600 Lambert and butler, 108 euros, some cheaper stuff there, Pall Mall, 600 think was 78 eros

reviews.title: Fake perfumes
reviews.review_text: I spent over $500 on perfumes I previously owned, but the ones I got from the airport don't last even 20 minutes, even with 6+ sprays, and have zero projection. Feels like they sold me fake

reviews.title: Beware
reviews.review_text: Do not trust the sales staff. Information on duty free allowances was incorrect and they fail to tell you that the euro price advertised is not the price you pay. The amount is converted to lira at an awful rate before it is debited from your credit card. At the time of purchase mastercard euro rate was 1.18. With their conversion to lira we got an equivalent 1.10. Very disappointing. Use cash if you can.

White House Hotel Istanbul.address: Catalcesme Sok. No: 21 Alemdar Mahallesi, Istanbul 34110 Turkiye
White House Hotel Istanbul.description: White House Hotel Istanbul is located in the heart of the historical peninsula and it is within walking distance to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Archeology Museum, the Basilica Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar, the Millennium Stone and Byzantine Hippodrome, which are the most important landmarks of the city. White House Hotel Istanbul is the ideal starting place for exploring this Ottoman capital city's endless historical sites, museums, restaurants, clubs and shops.
White House Hotel Istanbul.address_string: Catalcesme Sok. No: 21 Alemdar Mahallesi, Istanbul 34110 Turkiye

reviews.title: Amazing stay at the White house hotel Istanbul
reviews.review_text: The most amazing hotel in the World! Excellent ambient and decoration, perfectly clean rooms, amazing food and the best staff ever. I really enjoyed my stay in White house hotel Istanbul and will definitely be coming back. Hotel is small and quiet, in the perfect location only 5-10 minutes by foot from the main attractions such as Hagia Sophia, The blue mosque and The grand bazaar. I highly recommend to stay at the White House Hotel Istanbul! Unique experience in the World!

reviews.title: Best hotel and hospitality in Istanbul!
reviews.review_text:
Wonderful stay at the White House Hotel with hospitality that surpasses all expectations! The hotel interior is beautifully decorated with traditional Turkish touches and royal accents. The rooftop is also beautifully decorated and the breakfast space is cozy and welcoming. 

The staff is amazing and goes above and beyond to cater to the guests. We received delightful and refreshing welcome drinks as well as Turkish tea and coffee throughout our stay. It was a joy to be greeted by the staff always with a smile on their face. 

A special thanks to Mr. Harun, Mr. Kemal, and all the other staff at the hotel from the lobby to the rooftop breakfast who made our visit so memorable. The staff made it a delight to stay at this hotel, and I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in Sultanhamet!

reviews.title: Incredible hospitality and best location!
reviews.review_text:
Fantastic experience at the White House Hotel! Every staff member provided unparalleled care and service. 

The hotel is in a prime location and conveniently located near great restaurants and the historic city center. The rooftop has gorgeous views of the Hagia Sofia and the city, both day and night. The breakfast is also a great spread and we enjoyed the variety of fresh cheeses and pastries.  

The hotel staff is extremely attentive and promptly helped us, whether it was restaurant recommendations or directions to the nearest tram station. They also gave us a wonderful welcome drink, Turkish coffee, and a an apple tea specially from the hotel owner’s village! 

The White House hotel has been exceptional and the staff truly treats its guests like family. Highly recommend this amazing hotel!

reviews.title: Unforgettable experience!!
reviews.review_text:
Our stay at the White House hotel was exceptional! I am an avid traveler covered more than 25 countries and my experience with White House and the staff is very unique and unforgettable and would highly recommend this amazing hotel. 

The dedicated staff went out of their way to help and care for us. From the lobby receptionists to the staff at breakfast and the hotel manager Mr. Kemal, we were met with amazing service and care. 

The hotel is in a great location, just a short walk away from some of the main attractions in Sultanahmet with plenty of restaurants nearby. The rooms are very cozy with royal accents. Rooftop breakfast has a great variety and spread with an amazing view and the staff managing breakfast always greeted us with a warm smile. 

The hotel staff is extremely dedicated and helped us with anything we needed. The hotel owner Mr. Harun, his friend Mr. Halit went out of their way to help us during an unexpected event where we needed to visit a hospital. They called several hospitals to check which would be best for us and even arranged transportation. Mr. Halit and Mr. Kemal even accompanied us to the hospital and stayed with us until we were finished. 

We cannot thank the staff at the White House Hotel enough for their warm hospitality and for going out of the way to help us and make this trip so memorable.

reviews.title: Best Hotel in Istanbul!
reviews.review_text: Best hotel in Istanbul! The hospitality here is unmatched. The staff was so accommodating, helpful, and kind. We arrived several hours early from our flight and they were able to upgrade us to an available room, no extra charge! They welcomed us with tea and turkish delights and sent us home with some as well! Everything was so clean and the included breakfast was on their beautiful rooftop terrace overlooking the city! The views did not disappoint! Location is fantastic and only a short walk to the main square with Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque! Overall, would recommend to anyone staying in Istanbul!

Sofitel Istanbul Taksim.address: Gumussuyu Mah, Siraselviler Cad No 13, Istanbul 34437 Turkiye
Sofitel Istanbul Taksim.description: Texture of the city meets spirit of the Bosphorus at Sofitel Istanbul Taksim. This fascinating location hosts hundreds of different cultures and Sofitel Istanbul Taksim, situated only a few steps away from Taksim square is now ready to welcome its guests.
Sofitel Istanbul Taksim.address_string: Gumussuyu Mah, Siraselviler Cad No 13, Istanbul 34437 Turkiye

reviews.title: The warmth of the staff makes this hotel and the stay extraordinarily beautiful.
reviews.review_text: Our highlight were the staff at the breakfast place Level B1 besides the excellent spread, wide selection of cheese and a super helpful servers. The most outstanding experience was Mr. Muzaffer, our 4th floor housekeeper…he was warm, diligent, hospitable and a beautiful welcome smile. My 8 year old would wait for him to learn a few Turkish word from him. He made our stay very special. Thank you!

reviews.title: Hotel and staff
reviews.review_text: I stayed at the Sofitel Istanbul Taksim during my trip. The hotel is located in a great area, close to many attractions. The room was spacious and well-appointed with modern amenities, including a comfortable bed. The breakfast buffet was delicious, offering a variety of both local and international dishes. One staff member, Cho Cho, was especially helpful and made our stay even more enjoyable. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience, and I would definitely recommend the hotel to others.

reviews.title: Definitely need some refreshments
reviews.review_text:
Tanks to a fantastic crew, I will still give 4 star, but honestly I hab better experience in 4 star hotel of the same group
The breakfast buffet is below the standard you can except. The pastry not fresh, the choice of fruit or hot dish is weak. The coffee machines always in “cleaning mode”
The wood floor in the room definitely need a deep clean or even resurfacing . A lot of light switch / elevator call bouton are not working. And the loud music until past midnight from the restaurant on the 9 floor is really annoying .
Definitely not worth the extra money required compared to lower category hotel of the same group
Once again, thanks to all the hotel crew who helped to offset most of those annoying things

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I like the hotel as it is served mainly by Taqsim street. It is so clean and everything is near the hotel. The stuff is amazing and helpful, however special thanks go to Muzaffer for his kindness, constant smile and help. I enjoy my stay ; I recommend it..

reviews.title: Fun family trip
reviews.review_text:
We went for a family vacation.Great location, great service and good rooms .
Very attentive staff and a delicious breakfast spread.
Call out to the concierge Kaan who was super informative and made the trip all the more memorable.
Out of the three rooms one had booming noise till 2 in the morning from a nightclub so could be disturbing for some.

Barcelo Istanbul.address: Abdulhak Hamit Cad No 25 Kocatepe Mah, Istanbul 34435 Turkiye
Barcelo Istanbul.description: Set 7 minutes by foot from the nearest metro station, this upmarket hotel among bars and eateries is 6 km from both the landmark Hagia Sophia Museum and the iconic Blue Mosque. Accommodations range from relaxed rooms to polished 2-bedroom suites with kitchenettes, living areas and sofabeds. All feature flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi, as well as minibars, tea and coffeemakers, and safes; some have hammams. Room service is offered 24/7.
Barcelo Istanbul.address_string: Abdulhak Hamit Cad No 25 Kocatepe Mah, Istanbul 34435 Turkiye

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: Good room good hospitality very nice staff specially Ramadan in restaurant and shahin in reception also Mr.slieman in reception was very helpful also room big and comfortable bed,  very big bath room , location so near to everything needed

reviews.title: Ideal Location, Hospitable Staff
reviews.review_text: Best Place to Stay. The hotel has good location, it’s about 8 mins walk from the taksim Square, although there are hotels in the square, I was glad I chose Barcelo, over the square is chaotic and demonstration happen. But Barcelos location is quiet, the staff is amazing. Ms. D from front desk was so hospitable and kind. We traveled to Instanbul with my family with 2 teens and got the 2 bedroom suite, we all love the space and value. Thank you again!

reviews.title: Wonderful experience
reviews.review_text:
The staff were so helpful, smooth check in and check out by Sulaiman, rooms spacious and clean, ambience is classic, food was very good, shout out to Aminah for her breakfast as it was top of the notch.
Everything was a delight. From the Hamam and spa managed by Nabila and worked by Mila.

reviews.title: My Review
reviews.review_text: Overall my stay was short but is a pleasant one. I like the friendly attitude of staff and the breakfast very much.

reviews.title: Amazing stay
reviews.review_text:
Guys I’m a flight attendant we stay in a lot of hotels and take it from me when I say this is the best hotel you can find in Istanbul 
The Location is excellent you are in the middle of everything . The stuff is extremely professional and nice they will make your stay fantastic I wanna specially thank MILAD , Bushra, and SHAHIN …Malak from house keeping she is the best 
All the hotel stuff are so polite and always welling to help and assist . 
Thanks for the excellent stay
